taxonomy.desc: USAS categories: Semantic categories following the USAS Semantic tagset, cf. https://ucrel.lancs.ac.uk/usas/. The taxonomy was derived from https://ucrel.lancs.ac.uk/usas/semtags_subcategories.txt adding + and - modifiers where necessary. Other modifiers, in particular [mfnci%@] are not retained.
